alert.note: Alert for Dalton Highway Summits (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 19 at 11:28PM AKST until November 21 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT MONDAY NIGHT TO 9 PM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow with visibility as low as one half mile expected. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Dalton Highway Summits. * WHEN...From midnight Monday night to 9 PM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts will form. Travel will be very difficult. The cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
